name: Chicken Caesar Salad

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cooked, or 2-19 oz cans white navy beans

preparation: Chop cooked Rotisserie Chicken and set it aside.
In a small mixing bowl, combine salad dressing ingredients and set aside.
In a large serving bowl, combine chopped chicken, lettuce, chopped cucumber, dressing, and croutons.
Top with lemon or lime wedges and serve.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!
